description: Aspose.Imaging for .NET is an imaging library that lets developers create, edit, draw or convert images in their .NET applications. Aspose.Imaging provides features that go beyond the native capabilities of the development platform. It works independent of other applications and although Aspose.Imaging allows you to save to Adobe PhotoShop® format (PSD), you do not need PhotoShop on the machine.
releaseNotes:
Aspose.Imaging for .Net has been updated to version 3.4.0 and we are pleased to announce it
      Aspose.Imaging for .Net has been updated to version 3.4.0 and we are pleased to announce it.
      The following is a list of changes in this version of Aspose.Imaging.
      
      New features:
      IMAGING-34882 Ability to detect if a PSD has been flattened
      IMAGING-34614 Noise Removal Feature in part of IMAGING-35228 Add support of median and Wiener filtration
      
      Enhancements:
      IMAGING-35221 Load/Save operation for gif image does not creates watermark on saved image in evaluation mode
      IMAGING-35212 Spelling Mistake of a property in WebPOptions class[.Net]
      IMAGING-35151 Creating BMP image with Rle8 compression throw exception [.Net]
      IMAGING-35143 The results of saving of Jpeg images in CMYK color mode should be the same in COMPACT, SILVERLIGHT, .NET2.0 configurations
      IMAGING-35093 Converting DWG to PDF is producing empty PDF output file
      IMAGING-34634 Jpeg compression for Tiff should support all valid options combinations
      
      Exceptions
      IMAGING-35190 Investigate issue "The loading DWG file shows exception: Image loading failed"      

      Incompatable changes
      Obsolete entries are removed
